newsitem.title: USA: Dove reports Q2 with one-time charge.
newsitem.headline: Dove reports Q2 with one-time charge.

text.p: Dove Entertainment Inc reported a one-time second quarter charge of $564,000 for discontinuation of its Dove Kids and Video Books lines.
Management has reduced its estimate of future gross revenues associated with certain library product, resulting in a charge of $590,000 to cost of sales in the second quarter.
Since June 30, Dove has implemented certain cost savings with benefits expected to be realised by the fourth quarter.

Dove posted a net loss of $4,889,000 or $1.07 loss a share for the quarter following one-time costs of $2,178,000 for employee separation costs, discontinued product lines, versus a net loss of $2,669,000 or $0.47 loss per share a year earlier.
